ALTER TABLE `flowengine_standard_statuses` ADD COLUMN `sortIndex` SMALLINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AFTER `contentType`;

UPDATE `flowengine_standard_statuses` SET `sortIndex` = CASE `statusID` WHEN 1 THEN 1 WHEN 2 THEN 2 WHEN 6 THEN 3 WHEN 4 THEN 4 WHEN 5 THEN 5 WHEN 3 THEN 6 END WHERE (`statusID` = 1 AND `name` = 'Sparat') OR (`statusID` = 2 AND `name` = 'Inskickat') OR (`statusID` = 6 AND `name` = 'Vntar p komplettering') OR (`statusID` = 4 AND `name` = 'Kompletterat') OR (`statusID` = 5 AND `name` = 'Under behandling') OR (`statusID` = 3 AND `name` = 'Arkiverat');
